com.ftm.iamweb.controllers

Class IdentityViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ftm.iamweb.controllers.IdentityViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class IdentityViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Main controller that performs the CRUD operations using Facade pattern to access Identity DAO injection with Spring
    Author:
    Favio
